backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, question management, role-based authorization, and IQ test scoring logic with adaptive difficulty.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text listing short descriptions for all frontend components, pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/CHROME_INSTALL_AND_PUBLISH.md: Guide describing how to install the PWA in Chrome, build it for production, and submit it to the Chrome Web Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML containing PWA metadata, manifest link, and icon references for installability.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start_url, theme colors, and 192x192 and 512x512 icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing app‑shell caching, cache-first for static assets, and network-first for API calls with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and offline/profile modals.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation, and login/history controls based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth flow and clearing cached data.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Displays online/offline status banner with auto‑hide on reconnection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit their name and save a profile.
frontend/src/components/ProgressMeter.ts: Progress bar component showing current vs total steps as a percentage.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Protects child content by requiring authentication, showing a sign‑in card otherwise.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, questions, answers, scoring, and counts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with light/dark CSS variables defining theme colors and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AttemptDetailsPage.ts: Displays a detailed view of a specific test attempt, showing summary stats and a breakdown of each answered question.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's list of past test results with dates, scores, and navigation to individual attempt details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with marketing content and a call-to-action to start the test, handling login if needed.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays the most recent completed test result with score, accuracy, timing, and offline status handling.
frontend/src/pages/TestPage.tsx: Runs the adaptive IQ test flow, loading questions, submitting answers, adjusting difficulty, and saving results.
frontend/src/test/adaptiveLogic.ts: Defines adaptive test configuration and functions to compute next difficulty and tolerance based on progress.
frontend/src/test/historyStore.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and limiting test history in localStorage, including lookup by result ID.
frontend/src/test/sessionTypes.ts: Provides TypeScript interfaces for test sessions, attempts, and stored results used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, versions, and image needs for the High IQ app.
